ygData.subject: Re: Eye of Zomm Incredible Discovery!
ygData.msgSnippet: Well... that is an interesting thought... probably end up getting myself killed doing it though.  Heh.   Might have to try it anyhow.  :)
ygData.messageBody:
Well... that is an interesting thought... probably end up getting myself
killed doing it though. Heh. Might have to try it anyhow. :)


At 08:53 PM 5/18/99 -0400, you wrote:
>From: AdmiralQ2@...
>
>Wizards of Norrath Rejoice! The Eye of Zomm (Level 4 spell that makes an eye
>avatar for you to control) gives you the power of a rogue! It is a universal
>key!! the eye can open ANY door in the game! See ya locks! I know this
>seems rather sucky at first (ye canna walk through the door, since you are
>controlling the eye), but as yall pointed out, ye can train out the door
>whatever ye need! Yay for us
>
>
>
>Talar Firebrand, level 29 dark elf wizard, Rallos Zek
>
>------------------------------------------------------------------------
>Where do some of the Internet's largest email lists reside?
>http://www.onelist.com
>At ONElist - the most scalable and reliable service on the Internet.
